dwf.product_version: versions from v5.0 to before v5.12.4
dwf.description:
media: aspeed: fix clock handling logic

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.12.4 by commit 75321dc8aebe3f30eff226028fe6da340fe0bf02, it was introduced in version v5.0 by commit d2b4387f3bdf016e266d23cf657465f557721488. For more details please see the references link.
